This is the best game ever.
For those having trouble running it (either in OS X, or in Windows), there's a cross-platform emulator called ScummVM. It can run most of the old LucasArts adventure games.
how do you install the game?

As Batukha said. Run it with scummVM. :) It can be found here: http://www.scummvm.org/ 

They also have a section that tells you how to get the game to run.
